verses.verse: Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you sons of the mighty, <S%H1121><s%> ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due to his name. <S%H8034><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1927><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> is on the waters. <S%H4325><s%> The God <S%H410><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> thunders, <S%H7481><s%> even Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> on many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> is powerful. <S%H3581><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> is full of majesty. <S%H1926><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> breaks <S%H7665><s%> the cedars. <S%H730><s%> Yes, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh breaks <S%H7665><s%> in pieces the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
He makes them also to skip <S%H7540><s%> like a calf; <S%H5695><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> and Sirion <S%H8303><s%> like a young, <S%H1121><s%> wild ox. <S%H7214><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> strikes <S%H2672><s%> with flashes <S%H3852><s%> of lightning. <S%H784><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> shakes <S%H2342><s%> the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shakes <S%H2342><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> makes the deer <S%H355><s%> calve, <S%H2342><s%> and strips <S%H2834><s%> the forests <S%H3295><s%> bare. <S%H1964><s%> In his temple everything says, <S%H559><s%> "Glory! <S%H3519><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> enthroned at the Flood. <S%H3999><s%> Yes, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh sits <S%H3427><s%> as King <S%H4428><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with peace. <S%H7965><s%>
